title: Graphical Analysis of function: Geometry part - b

content.description: Let f be a function defined on the closed interval -3 ≤ x ≤ 4 with f(0) = 3. The graph of f', the derivative of f, consists of one line segment and a semicircle, as shown above.
content.question: Find the x-coordinate of each point of inflection of the graph of f on the open interval -3 < x < 4. Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: Find the x-coordinate of each point of inflection of the graph of f on the open interval -3 < x < 4. Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.6: Determining Concavity of Functions over Their Domains

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
